Title: Designates a portion of the state highway as the "John M. Grassia III Memorial Bridge"
Summary: Designates a portion of state route one hundred fifty-nine in the town of Rotterdam, county of Schenectady, as the "John M. Grassia III Memorial Bridge".
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the highway law, in relation to designating a portion of the state highway system as the "John M. Grassia III Memorial Bridge"
